H0.text: What meat is traditionally used in a Wiener Schnitzel. Pork

H1.text: What meat is traditionally used in a Wiener Schnitzel. Chicken

H2.text: What meat is traditionally used in a Wiener Schnitzel. Beef

H3.text: What meat is traditionally used in a Wiener Schnitzel. Veall

A4.text: Austrian law requires that Wiener Schnitzel be made of veal.

A5.text: The dish is prepared from butterfly-cut veal slices, about 4 mm in thickness and lightly pounded flat.
